EmailTemplate.name: ImcSolutionsSystemManagerTraining_Fall2011.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Imc Solutions System Manager Training - October 7 and 21
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register Now - Seats Will Fill Up Soon
Imc Solutions System Manager Training October 7, 2011 or October 21, 2011
What: Training for advanced Imc Solutions users designated as primary/lead Imc Solutions “guru” for department or agency.
Date: October 7, 2011 or October 21, 2011
When: 9 am to 4 pm ET
Description: Inter-departmental seminar which includes network and hardware issues, server and workstation maintenance relative to the Imc software, backups, printers, Imc updates, database analyzing, system logs, identifying error codes, security issues, laptops, mobiles, E911 Interface, case management, new feature processes, questions and answers.
Training Location: TriTech Software Systems Information Management Corporation Divison 13 Centennial Drive North Grafton, MA 01536
Cost: $250 per seat
*Each class holds 12 seats, a new date may need to be added as the class fills up. Please check email often to see if a new date becomes available.
*PLEASE NOTE: Your registration is NOT confirmed as booked until you receive an official quote from your TriTech Imc Solutions' representative and it is returned to us with all the proper signatures etc.
REGISTER: please copy and paste this link into a browser window: http://offers.tritech.com/ImcSolutionsSystemManagerTraining_Fall2011_RegistrationLandingPage.html
Questions? Contact Coleen Storck 774-551-9100 | coleen.storck@tritech.com
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121
